ca.uqac.lif.dag

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.dag.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connectable, Duplicable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomicFunction, LabelledNode, NestedNode

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connectable, Duplicable
    Abstract entity having input and output pins that can be linked to pins of of other nodes.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<Pin<? extends Node>>> m_inputs
      A map associating input pin indices with a list of output pins of other nodes.
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<Pin<? extends Node>>> m_outputs
      A map associating output pin indices with a list of input pins of other nodes.

      • addToInput

        public void addToInput(int index,
                       Pin<? extends Node> pin)
        Description copied from interface: Connectable
        Adds a node's output pin to the set of connections of this node's input pin. If other pins are already associated to this input pin, they are kept.
        Specified by:
        addToInput in interface Connectable
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the current node's input pin
        pin - A node's output pin to add to the connections

      • setToInput

        public void setToInput(int index,
                       Pin<? extends Node> pin)
        Description copied from interface: Connectable
        Sets a node's output pin as the connection of this node's input pin. If other pins are already associated to this input pin, they are deleted.
        Specified by:
        setToInput in interface Connectable
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the current node's input pin
        pin - A node's output pin to add to the connections
